programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: James Constantinou gets stopped in his tracks test driving a £30,000 Radical racing car, memorabilia expert Lawrence Pickett deals with an intriguing enquiry about a piece of pop art, while handbag expert Claudia Valentin is moved to tears by a client with an emotional story. James also values a tiara belonging to a martial arts fan, which could be worth £40,000.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Deals on the table today include a cross between a motorbike and a boat, rare vintage champagne, an unusual mechanical calculator, and an Aboriginal weapon known as a nulla nulla.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer head to north-west England, where Richard and Helen Francis have been experiencing the city-centre lifestyle in Manchester. However, with a baby on the way, they are looking to move to the suburbs on a budget of £400,000. In Preston, Graham and Nina Walker hope to swap their tiny rented terraced house for their first marital home.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: The East Midlands is the focus of this week's house-hunting, as Kirstie Allsopp joins Sam and Becky, who have a £100,000 budget and are looking for a house in Nottingham with a sizeable plot of land. Phil Spencer is with Nigel and Jane, who sold their home in Australia and moved back to the UK when Nigel was diagnosed with early onset dementia. But despite being back for months, they have struggled to find a property that lives up to expectations.(n)

programme.title: Coast vs Country
programme.desc: Coastal enthusiast David Bull and countryside fan Kirsty Duffy advise a couple wishing to invest £300,000 in a property in East Sussex.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final day in the competition sees the B&B owners meet for the last time to find out what they have been paid and to settle some scores. The Brighton Surf Hotel is first up and hosts Jeremy and Elena Mann want to defend their no-breakfast remote-hosting concept.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Club owner and millionaire Vernal Aley hosts the first in a week of parties on the Wirral, Merseyside, inviting feminist and student Candida Darling, party girl Chrissy Griffin, chicken enthusiast Adele Richards and project manager Stuart Leake to dinner.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Feminist and student Candida Darling continues the challenge on the Wirral. The views she holds on Vernal Aley's lap-dancing business are questioned when the guests discover a set of revealing pictures, but the night ends in good spirits.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Chicken enthusiast Adele Richards intends to use an abundance of home-grown ingredients, including freshly laid eggs, when she hosts the third party on the Wirral. Unfortunately, her efforts are overshadowed by the amount of cat hair her guests find in the food - a situation Chrissy Griffin finds immensely amusing.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Hairdresser Chrissy Griffin hosts the fourth dinner party on the Wirral, Merseyside, hoping to win over her guests with a Caribbean menu and a group of Spanish troubadours. However, tensions soon boil over and one of the party storms out.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Project manager Stuart Leake hosts the final dinner party on the Wirral and hopes to bring harmony to the group with a 1920s-themed event. He also gives a demonstration of his piano playing, before the contestants discover who will be taking home the prize money.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Brooklyn, New York, to tackle a 55-year-old family business. Owner John Esposito left school at the age of 14 and has worked at his parents' restaurant, Sal's Pizzeria, ever since. Their success meant they could afford to purchase the location next door in the 1990s, naming it Mama Maria after John's mother, who died in 2002. But when he lost his father as well, John became overwhelmed by the responsibility of running both establishments and his livelihood is at risk.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Beaver, Pennsylvania, where he meets a brother-and-sister team who find it almost impossible to work together. Their relationship is so fractured that they're failing to save their father's Italian restaurant from being overwhelmed by local competition, and the situation has become so desperate that their dad is in danger of losing his life savings.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer head to Hampshire, where former naval officer Colin Nugent and wife Gillian are hoping to buy their first home after 23 years of marriage and 12 relocations with the military. Meanwhile, Army captain Ian Bellamy will be leaving the forces and is looking for a new house with girlfriend Diane Pittard.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A Labrador is rushed to Fitzpatrick's unable to stand, and although Professor Noel Fitzpatrick tells the family that surgery is not an option, his team devises an alternative care plan. The vets also treat a bichon frise suffering chronic elbow pain, and a leonberger has a bone tumour removed from its leg after being diagnosed with cancer.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 79-year-old woman is airlifted to hospital after being involved in a road traffic collision, with consultants concerned that she may have life-threatening internal bleeding. Meanwhile, 80-year-old Mohammad has come to A&E after falling at home during a family Eid celebratory feast, and 56-year-old Russ is brought in after falling from a ladder while cutting back some trees at work.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.desc: New series. Return of the documentary that follows the work of Bedfordshire Police around the clock as they investigate a number of major crimes. In the first edition, a man emerges from a hotel lift covered in blood and holding a fire extinguisher, before approaching the reception desk and shouting that he has killed someone. Cameras follow every twist and turn as detectives try to work out what really happened at the hotel close to Luton Airport, which has suddenly become a chaotic and bloody crime scene.(n)

programme.title: Micky Flanagan: The Out Out Tour
programme.desc: A performance by the comedian from his sold-out nationwide tour. He tells the story of his upbringing in London's East End and his rise to fame, making observations about the British class system along the way.(n)

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Two more singletons choose a date from a selection of six naked people, who will be revealed to them one body part at a time. Single mum Tracy from Bedfordshire has been out of the dating game since she split with her fiancee three years ago and hopes to find a man who matches her adventurous side, while London sales advisor Matthew, 24, is tired of dating apps and thinks online profiles mean girls never actually see the real him. Anna Richardson hosts.(n)

programme.title: Bizarre ER
programme.desc: Stories include a man who changed the blade of his angle grinder with the motor running, and a lady who is harbouring a creature in her ear. Previously seen on E4.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy panel show's version of the words-and-numbers quiz, with Sean Lock and Stephen Mangan teaming up against Noel Fielding and Fay Ripley. The Brett Domino Trio are in Dictionary Corner with Susie Dent, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.(n)

programme.title: Gogglesprogs
programme.desc: New series. The first of a new six-part run in which the nation's younger viewers maintain a close eye on a range of TV output. This series sees the existing army of junior sofa critics supplemented by newcomers Roma, Joel, Jack, Sadie, Declan, Amelinda and Yoanna, who join in to offer their honest, inimitable and ultimately hilarious take on recent shows to hit the small-screen. Items under scrutiny in this opening edition include coverage of the General Election, culinary queen Mary Berry and the classic movie Grease.(n)

programme.title: The World's Weirdest Weather
programme.desc: Alex Beresford explores bizarre weather phenomena, including a flash flood in New Zealand that washed a dozen eels onto a suburban street, and a huge swarm of seemingly flying spiders in Brazil, powered by static electricity from a thunderstorm. Plus, a strange wave that submerged an entire town in Argentina, the barrel-shaped cloud that helps hang-gliders fly for hours on end, and a volcano in Hawaii that produces its own mini tornados.(n)

programme.title: The Fake News Show
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan hosts the comedy panel show, with team captains Katherine Ryan and Richard Osman joined by guest captain Richard Ayoade, Rhod Gilbert, Gogglebox's Steph and Dom Parker, and political scientist Professor John Curtice to determine the truth being hidden by fake news, dissecting outlandish headlines, alternative facts, digitally altered photographs and all-too-believable viral clips.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jerry and Christine Steele's love of South Africa began decades ago and they have decided to spend part of their retirement in a second home among the beaches and national parks of the Garden Route stretch of the south-eastern coast. For their budget of £60,000, Laura Hamilton shows them five great value properties.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Lee and Lynn Fox from South Yorkshire have been regular visitors to the Tuscan city of Lucca since Lee's job as a mechanical engineer first took him there over 10 years ago. Lynn's hairdressing business and Lee's job keep the couple very busy, so making the most of their quality time together is key. Laura Hamilton makes it her mission to show them a variety of properties as close to the city centre as possible, on a budget of £170,000.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: In Sheffield, Dan considers an Olympic football signed by the Team GB women and a 200-year-old picture with a royal connection. A monster sound system attracts the team in Brighton.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: In south east London, Nathan and Debbs are taken aback by a ventriloquist's dummy, while in Sheffield, Dan appraises a classic campervan and considers one of his biggest ever deals.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: At Nikolas Patrick Pawnbrokers in Kent, brothers Charlie and Patrick inspect a collection of boxing memorabilia owned by former boxing promoter Kellie Maloney, as well as an unusual electric unicycle. At London Road in Sheffield, Dan has a diamond encrusted bracelet in his sights, and is also considering deals on two high-end leather belts and a huge collection of coins featuring some of the world's most dangerous creatures.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Deals on the table today include a cross between a motorbike and a boat, rare vintage champagne, an unusual mechanical calculator, and an Aboriginal weapon known as a nulla nulla.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits four restaurants he earlier tried to save, finding out whether they stayed on the road to recovery or fallen by the wayside. First he visits the Spanish Pavillion in New Jersey, then heads to California to see the owners of Kingston Cafe, French-themed La Frite, and Capri.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef visits beachside restaurant Barefoot Bob's in Hull, Massachusetts, owned by husband-and-wife team Marc and Lisa. Every year profits nosedive through the bleak winter months, and matters aren't improved when it becomes clear they have both lost their passion - not only for the business but also for each other. With the restaurant and marriage on the line, Gordon tries to help turn things around before it's too late.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three previous restaurants he tried to save, finding out whether they stayed on the road to recovery or turned back into nightmares. First he heads for West Babylon, New York, where he helped the inexperienced owners of restaurant Classic American deal with their escalating debts, before returning to Davide in Boston, an Italian restaurant run by two warring brothers. Finally, he visits Down City, a restaurant in Providence, Rhode Island, run by hot-headed owner Abby.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to the Olde Hitching Post in Hanson, Massachusetts, where he meets a stubborn owner who doesn't react well to criticism. Tom bought the restaurant for his daughter Andrea, but six years later he's still refusing to let her run it. Can the chef break Tom's iron grip on the business and persuade him to change his outdated approach?.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Beaver, Pennsylvania, where he meets a brother-and-sister team who find it almost impossible to work together. Their relationship is so fractured that they're failing to save their father's Italian restaurant from being overwhelmed by local competition, and the situation has become so desperate that their dad is in danger of losing his life savings.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Pioneering veterinarian Noel Fitzpatrick plans to use groundbreaking cell technology to repair damaged cartilage in a 10-month-old golden retriever that helps a five-year-old girl cope with epilepsy. A cat arrives at the surgery with a suspected rat bite that seems to be getting bigger, and a whippet is brought in after being hit by a car - sustaining multiple pelvic fractures.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Professional singer Precious seeks romance with amateur magician Earle. The restaurant also welcomes company director John, who hopes fellow Scot Greig is the man he can settle down with. And fellow diner Hebe is on the verge of giving up on finding Mr Right. Hopefully she will connect with fine wine merchant Charles.(n)

programme.title: Dance Moms

programme.title: Dance Moms

Meanwhile, all the girls compete in a high-fashion photo shoot to appear on the cover of a major magazine.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: Part one of two. Cate is forced to eat humble pie in front of Principal Gibb when she forgets to return an important document to school. Rory plays a devious joke on CJ by setting him up with his girlfriend Missy's engaged sister. Guest starring Adam Arkin (Sons of Anarchy).(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Emily and Rory return home exhausted from fending off amorous European men. TJ plays up his injury to get sympathy and Lane realises she is falling for Zack.(n)

programme.title: Dance Moms
programme.desc: Abby returns from Hollywood to find that many of her dancers have been slacking. The mothers make a pact to stop their daughters performing on television.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Agents chase more than £1,700 in unpaid parking fines in south-east London, but struggle to pinpoint the debtor. Meanwhile, officers in north Wales try to recover the £2,000 owed by a tradesman to a former employer, and in Kent agents chase £8,000 owed by a jewellery shop to two former employees.(n)

programme.desc: Zac and Leah have a lunch date, Morag manages to get John's appeal fast-tracked and Justin tells Phoebe whether or not he is going to go to America with her.(n)

programme.title: Dance Moms

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.sub-title: Toddlers Make You Laugh Out Loud.
programme.desc: Compilation of internet videos featuring children doing bizarre and humorous things. Youngsters featured include sassy six-year-old Johanna, whose extraordinary performance of Aretha Franklin's Respect at her school recital in 2015 has been viewed more than 50 million times. Plus, three-year-old April, who blames a nail-polish disaster on her doll. Featuring contributions by Zoe Lyons, Hal Cruttenden and Ellie Taylor. Narrated by Iain Lee.(n)

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the future, most of the human race exists in poverty on a ruined Earth, while a wealthy elite live in luxury on an orbiting space station. A man dying of radiation poisoning fights security forces to gain access to the satellite and its medical facilities. Sci-fi thriller from the director of District 9, starring Matt Damon, Jodie Foster and Sharlto Copley.(n)

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.desc: Jessica Lange portrays country-western singer Patsy Cline (1932-63). Ed Harris. Hilda: Ann Wedgeworth. Randy: David Clennon. Gerald: James Staley. Woodhouse: Gary Basaraba. Otis: John Goodman. Wanda: P.J. Soles. Girl Singer: Terri Gardner. Karel Reisz directed(n)

programme.title: Dragonfly
programme.desc: Joe Darrow works as a doctor in the emergency room of Chicago Memorial Hospital. His wife, Emily Darrow, was last seen in a rainstorm in Venezuela, where she was on a retreat with the Red Cross offering humanitarian aid. She vanished in a bus accident. There were no survivors and her body was never found. That rich, green, exotic land is left behind as Joe is challenged to persevere through sad, rainy days back home. Joe promised Emily that if anything ever happened to her, he would visit her patients in the oncology ward. Strangely, the children seem to know him, and they say they've seen Emily in their near-death experiences. Joe starts to believe that his wife is using the near-death experiences of her terminal patients to communicate with him, through images the children report seeing in their dreams, and symbols they are inexplicably compelled to draw. While the children see Joe as a kindred spirit, the hospital staff worries about how these interactions are agitating them. At home, Joe begins finding other ethereal evidence of his wife's attempt to contact him from beyond the grave, some of it featuring the image of a dragonfly, which was the shape of the birthmark on her shoulder. His friends and a caring neighbor (Kathy Bates) worry that Joe is losing his marbles, especially as his quest becomes more frantic, putting his job in jeopardy(n)

programme.title: Freeheld
programme.desc: Docudrama about terminally ill New Jersey police officer Laurel Hester, whose 2005 legal battle for the right to pass her pension benefits on to her female life partner became an equal-rights milestone(n)

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: In this spy thriller set in the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin team up to stop an international criminal organisation that is trafficking nuclear weapons and technology. Adaptation of the TV series of the same name(n)

programme.title: Enough
programme.desc: In this gripping drama, a battered wife goes on the lam with her young daughter, but decides to fight back when her abusive husband tracks them down(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: Reteaming the director and star of Gangs of New York, Martin Scorcese's The Aviator stars Leonardo DiCaprio as legendary millionaire Howard Hughes. Focusing on the early part of Hughes' adult life, the film chronicles how he built his fortune, beginning as the proprietor of his late father's tool company, then as a Hollywood producer and the owner of RKO studios, and later as an aviation mogul. Alan Alda, Alec Baldwin, and Kate Beckinsale also star(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Writer-director Paul W.S. Anderson's turbo-charged, slam-bang tune-up of Roger Corman's 1975 cult vehicle "Death Race 2000" follows the non-stop action taking place during a do-or-die contest pitting a convict (Jason Statham) against other cons, with the winner walking off with his freedom. Anderson admits to being "a big fan of the Corman movie," and this reworking is a glowing salute to Corman's original. Corman also serves as one of the film's producers, along with Anderson and Tom Cruise(n)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Paul Walker returns as former cop Brian O'Connor who teams up with his ex-con pal Roman Pearce to transport a shipment of 'dirty' money for shady Miami-based import-export dealer Carter Verone, while actually working with undercover agent Monica Clemente to bring Verone down(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: In the third installment of this horror series about a night when all crime is legal, a former police sergeant who refused to murder his son's killer must now act as the head of security for a presidential candidate who wants to end "the Purge"(n)

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger stars as a cyborg, sent from the future to assassinate a young woman who's destined to give birth to a son who will become the key to saving humanity(n)

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Big-budget action fantasy about the battle for survival in a world where dry land has disappeared with the melting of the polar ice caps. One man, who has become amphibious, tries to protect survivors on an artificial atoll made from scrap metal by taking on a gang of marauding pirates. He is also bent on discovering whether there is any truth in the myth that there is still some land left above water(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul, headed to Mexico with his collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a rowdy gang and finds himself exiled by the town marshal, which sparks a bloody quest for revenge(n)

programme.title: The Soloist
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx stars as Nathaniel Ayers, a former violin prodigy whose bouts with schizophrenia landed him on the streets after two years of schooling at Juilliard(n)

programme.title: No Reservations
programme.desc: Top New York chef Kate has her well-ordered world turned upside-down by the arrival of her orphaned niece at home and a handsome new workmate in the kitchen(n)

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Director Richard LaGravenese's romantic drama stars Hilary Swank as Holly Kennedy, a New York real estate agent forced to come to terms with the unexpected death of her young Irish husband Gerry. Before he died, Gerry wrote her a series of letters, to be delivered across the forthcoming year, hoping to help her grieve. The letters give her vivid flashbacks to their life together and, under his written direction, she visits Gerry's parents in Ireland, where she ultimately finds the strength to move on. Lisa Kudrow, Gina Gershon, Harry Connick Jr and Jeffrey Dean Morgan also star(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: An ambitious corporate troubleshooter is stranded on a deserted island for five years, eventually returning to society as a changed man(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: In this thrilling and action-packed entry, Harry enters his fifth year at Hogwarts and forms a group with his friends called "Dumbledore's Army" to defend themselves against the Dark Arts(n)

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A mysterious videotape surfaces, leaving anyone who views it with just seven days to live. Can journalist Rachel Keller solve the mystery without falling victim to its deadly curse?(n)

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: A desperate mother seeks the help of a pair of priests, when her angelic daughter becomes possessed by a terrible demon. Horror(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: A cop out to avenge the murder of his family sees the investigation take a supernatural turn for the worse(n)

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A stolen painting and a crooked land deal intertwines the destinies of a Russian mobster, a London gangster and a junkie punk rocker in writer-director Guy Ritchie's stylish caper film(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Castle looks into a mysterious death of a fan at a sci-fi convention, apparently killed by a genuine space laser, of which only two working examples exist. Away from the investigation, the event sees Beckett's love of the cult series Nebula 9 revealed. Nathan Fillion and Stana Katic star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the case of a gay man beaten to death during the abduction of his adopted infant son. At first they suspect the victim's wealthy partner may be complicit in the crime - until information about the child's birth mother and homophobic biological father prompts them to pursue a different line of inquiry.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A pregnant loan officer is found murdered in the boot of her car and the trail leads to drugs and a professional basketball player, whose ties to the victim appear to extend beyond the financial deal she approved for him. Detective drama, with Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team are called to a deaf family's home, where a woman has been shot and killed - a case that brings up memories of Lindsay's troubled past. Meanwhile, Stella and Danny investigate the murder of a promising figure-skater who has been found dead at the ice rink - and come to suspect she was not the intended target. Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes and Anna Belknap star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team uncovers an alliance between al-Qaeda and a Mexican drug cartel when it investigates a shoot-out at a pawn shop. As the agents explore the reasons behind the unusual coalition, a Mexican police chief with a vendetta against the Mendoza gang joins them.(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: The duo investigate when the body of a TV reality show star is found in a Manhattan alley. Meanwhile, things do not go according to plan when Castle tries to give Beckett a Valentine's Day gift. Crime drama, starring Nathan Fillion and Stana Katic.(n)

programme.title: Person of Interest
programme.desc: The number of an already dying man comes up, and Reese leaves the team behind in the aftermath of the war with the crime organisation. Meanwhile, flashbacks to Finch's adolescence provide an insight into his creation of The Machine. Jim Caviezel and Michael Emerson star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the death of a woman killed in what appears to be a road rage incident. However, as they retrace her last actions, they suspect she was accidentally murdered by an assassin following the wrong car. The intended victim turns out to be a reporter claiming to have uncovered a plot to rig an election by a senator, who Briscoe suspects of having connections with the Mafia.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The body of a female jogger is found in a park, and detectives Briscoe and Green discover she was mauled to death by a pit-bull terrier. The race is on to trace the animal and its owner before another tragedy occurs - and the team is shocked to discover a warehouse where dogs are trained for illegal fighting. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and Danny try to catch the killer of a conman whose body has been found lying in a pile of money - a mystery compounded by the discovery that he had been building an ark in his back garden. Across the city, Stella and Flack examine the body of a man dressed in a cigarette costume who appears to have burned to death, and follow a trail that leads to the headquarters of a tobacco company.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen, Kensi and the team hunt for an electromagnetic pulse device that was stolen from a college research facility, and could destroy Los Angeles if activated, killing millions of people. Elsewhere, Sam is on the lookout for a Christmas present for his daughter. Crime drama, starring Chris O'Donnell, LL Cool J and Daniela Ruah.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Nell goes undercover at the Department of Defence after a researcher is found dead, and new NCIS assistant director Owen Granger fails to endear himself to the rest of the team. Crime drama, starring Renee Felice Smith and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A professional golfer is murdered, and a search of her phone's GPS and call history reveals she had been contacting someone on an anonymous `burner' phone. The phone's location appears to correlate to big golf tournaments, except for one weekend when calls were made to Vegas when there was no such event taking place. This finding leads the detectives to uncover the shady dealings of a fellow sports star. Crime drama, starring Corey Stoll, Alfred Molina and Skeet Ulrich.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the rape of a teenage TV personality whose raunchy antics on and off camera had made her unpopular within the community. As events unfold, they are shocked to discover her suspected attacker may have been acting on the suggestion of a controversial DJ who had been baiting the star over the airwaves.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives are taunted by a serial killer who leaves clues about his next targets scattered around the city. Suspecting the perpetrator is emulating the crimes of a murderer active in the 1970s, they visit the one surviving victim of the original, a woman who was recently quizzed about the case by a reporter.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis think they have stumbled on the work of a serial killer after a woman is found on the cusp of death, having survived days of torture. Briscoe and Curtis are quickly on the case and are shocked to discover a plot involving the victim's own family.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Having returned home to Chicago, Mac finally realises his stalker's motivation and identity. In his absence, Stella leads the team to the subway where a train driver has been murdered. However, this crime turns out to be another message from the killer and part of a long-term plan inspired by his desire for revenge. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Stella, Flack and Lindsay suspect a joke-shop owner known as Laughing Larry was somehow complicit in the murder of an extravagant internet entrepreneur killed by an exploding cigar. Meanwhile, Danny is devastated by the death of a neighbour who was shot during a robbery at a grocery store. Drama, starring Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: Chicago PD
programme.desc: The city is in chaos following an explosion outside a hospital on the route of a busy charity running event. While the fire and ambulance services do their best to free those trapped and patch up the wounded, Voight focuses his attention on finding the culprits. Chicago Fire spin-off, starring Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer and Patrick John Flueger.(n)

programme.desc: Vigilante building experts Adam Carolla and Skip Bedell set out to pressure unlicensed contractor Myron to deliver the new kitchen promised to the Wislocki family and make safe the fire hazard he originally left.(n)

programme.title: Longmire
programme.desc: Walt receives a call from a man about a distressed young woman in his store, but later finds the shopkeeper has been killed and the girl has run off. Walt calls on Henry and the Ferg to help track her down and they pick up a trail that leads to a rabbit hutch, where they find an abandoned baby.(n)

programme.title: Longmire
programme.desc: When the president of the tribal council is found dead in his car on county land, it is clear to Walt that the body has been moved from the original crime scene. He discovers that the victim had a gambling problem and delves into the seedy world of an illegal poker game held in a tattoo parlour. Meanwhile, the sheriff also deals with feelings of betrayal when he finds out Cady and Branch are having an affair.(n)

programme.title: The Art of Murder: Garage Sale Mystery 7
programme.desc: While busy preparing for a charity garage sale event, an antique store owner discovers a body in the attic of a nearby home. Using her eye for detail, as well as her experience with antiques and murder, she sets about putting together clues to help catch a killer. Drama, starring Lori Loughlin, Steve Bacic and Eva Bourne.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Try and Catch Me
programme.desc: A grieving crime writer blames her niece's husband for her death and concocts a plan to take revenge, luring him to her walk-in vault, before locking him in and leaving him to die. She then puts her knowledge of the criminal mind to good use by covering her tracks, and although Columbo strongly suspects foul play, he finds clues are thin on the ground. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk and Ruth Gordon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Hetty enlists the help of a former colleague when an ex-Navy intelligence officer is murdered, but things go awry when her old friend threatens to kill her. The team races to save Hetty and expose her one-time workmate as having lied to the victim in order to make money from a seemingly charitable venture.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates when a dishonourably discharged marine is accused of beating a Japanese tourist to death, having already been linked with the rape of a businessman's daughter. He claims that he is in love with the girl he is alleged to have raped, and that the accusations being thrown in his direction are a fabrication initiated by her father.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates when a naval seaman and an infamous arms dealer are found dead near the Mexican border. Evidence suggests the men were trying to smuggle a wooden box into the US, but there is no sign of the container, nor any clue as to what could be inside. Crime drama, starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Sam heads to Sudan to help a CIA agent gather evidence of al-Qaeda terrorist training, but Callen is forced to rush to the country too, when one of them is killed while carrying out the mission. Crime drama, starring LL Cool J and Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Deeks places his job in danger when he shoots and kills an unarmed man during a mission to retrieve Semtex explosives from a marine warehouse, prompting unexpected emotions for Kensi as she contemplates losing her partner. Crime drama, starring Eric Christian Olsen and Daniela Ruah.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen, Hanna and the team search for a group of terrorists suspected of murdering an ex-army sergeant. Meanwhile, Deeks and Kensi continue to bond. Starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the parades and parties at Mardi Gras after a petty officer is found murdered. Money and possessions were still on the deceased's body, so Pride rules out robbery as a motive and security footage suggests the victim had already been stabbed before he even made it to the event. More worryingly, further investigations lead to a tip-off about an upcoming `heist' at the festivities. Stacy Keach guest stars, with Scott Bakula.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After navy recruiter Maggie Barringer is targeted in a fatal hit-and-run incident, Chris and Meredith learn she was foster mother to two teenage brothers. programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: John Travolta and Denzel Washington star in Tony Scott's remake of the 1974 thriller. It's a day the passengers on a New York subway train are unlikely to forget. And it's one that could rescue the professional life of subway employee Walter Garber, whose glittering career has been derailed by allegations of corruption. Garber is languishing on duty as a train dispatcher when all hell breaks loose after one of the Lexington Avenue line trains is hijacked by a gang led by the supremely self-assured, dispassionately ruthless Ryder. Ryder issues a demand for $10m and makes it clear that he won't hesitate to kill anyone who gets in his way. Garber and NYPD hostage negotiator Lieutenant Camonetti attempt to get to grips with the crisis but, as events progress, suspicions arise as to whether there's more to the hijacking than first meets the eye. Also starring James Gandolfini as New York's mayor and Luis Guzmán as a disgruntled subway worker who has joined Ryder's gang(n)

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: Don Vito Corleone is the head of a New York Mafia "family". Problems arise when a gangster supported by another Mafia family, Sollozzo, announces his intentions to start selling drugs all over New York. Don Vito hates the idea of drugs, and he is quite happy with the gambling/protection etc. that make him money, so an attempt is made on his life. programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: Comedian Cedric the Entertainer serves as both producer and star of this comedy about a family who discovers just how much can go wrong en route to a family get-together. When Nate Johnson (Cedric the Entertainer) is invited to a big family reunion in Missouri, he sees it as an opportunity to reconnect with his estranged wife and growing children, as well as a chance to show up his wealthier know-it-all brother, Mack (Steve Harvey). Nate takes delivery on an expensive new SUV, persuades his recently separated wife, Dorothy (Vanessa L. Williams), to tag along, and packs up his three kids -- nubile teenager Nikki (Solange Knowles), under-age wannabe rapper D.J. (Bow Wow), and precocious seven-year-old Destiny (Gabby Soleil) -- for what he imagines will be a leisurely drive from Los Angeles to St. Louis. However, between his wary wife, arguing kids, angry police officers, bizarre hitchhikers, bad diner food, and an unfortunate run-in with a cement mixer, getting from point A to point B proves to be just short of a nightmare. Johnson Family Vacation was the first feature film for director Christopher Erskin, who previously distinguished himself directing music videos for the likes of Missy Elliot, TLC, and Boyz II Men(n)

programme.title: The Enforcer
programme.desc: Dirty Harry must foil a terrorist organisation made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with a rookie female partner that he's not too excited to be working with(n)

programme.title: The Glimmer Man
programme.desc: Action thriller about a government agent who is asked to resume his old role as a police officer to help catch a serial killer preying on the citizens of LA. Teamed with a local homicide detective, the agent discovers that the killer seems to know a lot about his past despite a change of occupation and identity(n)

programme.title: Stir of Echoes
programme.desc: In this supernatural thriller, Tom Witzky (Kevin Bacon) is a fairly typical working-class guy living in Chicago with his wife Maggie (Kathryn Erbe) and his son Jake (Zachary David Cope). One night at a party, Tom gets into a lively discussion with his sister-in-law, Lisa (Illeana Douglas), who believes in psychic communication and the power of hypnosis. He challenges Lisa to hypnotize him, and she plants in him a post-hypnotic suggestion to be more open-minded. But the results aren't quite what Lisa or Tom expected; Tom now senses an air of terrible dread throughout his house and is convinced that evil lurks just around the corner. He also sees the spirit of a girl from the neighborhood who disappeared months ago -- and Jake sees the spirit as well. Stir of Echoes was based on a novel by Richard Matheson, whose work inspired such disparate films as Somewhere in Time and The Incredible Shrinking Man; it was written and directed by David Koepp, who wrote the screenplays for Jurassic Park and Mission: Impossible(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: At the end of the Gulf War, U.S. soldiers George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg and Ice Cube set off on a secret mission to find stolen Iraqi gold(n)

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: A brother and sister discover a lair full of modified bodies and before they know it are on the run from a terrifying beast on a ritualistic killing spree(n)

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: When he has a vision of his flight to Paris crashing, a teen travelling with his French club makes a scene and they are all kicked off the airline. The plane goes down and the survivors are grateful, but Death hunts them down(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Mark Steven Johnson's violent superhero fantasy-morality play stars Ben Affleck as Matt Murdock, a guilt-wracked blind vigilante with a penchant for red leather. During his childhood, an accident involving toxic waste blinded Murdock, but it also enhanced his other senses and gave him a kind of 'radar vision'. The incident was partially caused by his discovery that his father was involved with the Mob. Now, the adult Murdock, spurred partly by Catholic guilt over his role in his father's death, has dedicated this life to fighting crime and protecting the innocent. By day Murdock's a defence lawyer, but by night he dispenses summary justice to criminals who've escaped the courts. Things get complicated when he falls in love with Elektra Natchios (Jennifer Garner). Not only is she the daughter of a man with connections to New York crime bosses but, unknown to Murdock, she's also a vigilante who's equally keen on figure-hugging leather (black in her case). And when Daredevil is framed for the murder of her father, Elektra swears vengeance on the masked crime-fighter (not realising that he's her lover). Meanwhile, both of them are in mortal danger from the actual killer, a merciless Irish assassin called Bullseye (Colin Farrell)(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalize Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: High-octane action thriller about a cop who goes undercover in Los Angeles's street-racing world in order to snare a villainous gang-leader(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul, headed to Mexico with his collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a rowdy gang and finds himself exiled by the town marshal, which sparks a bloody quest for revenge(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: In northern Australia at the beginning of World War II, an English aristocrat inherits a cattle station the size of Maryland. When English cattle barons plot to take her land, she reluctantly joins forces with a rough-hewn stock-man to drive 2,000 head of cattle across hundreds of miles of the country's most unforgiving land, only to still face the bombing of Darwin, Australia, by the Japanese forces that had attacked Pearl Harbor only months earlier(n)

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Stephen Glass is a staff writer for the respected - current events and policy magazine - The New Republic, and a freelance feature writer for Rolling Stone Magazine and others. By the mid-90s, Glass' articles had turned him into one of the most sought-after young journalists in Washington D.C., but a bizarre chain of events suddenly stopped his careers path. Nominated for four Independent Spirit Awards and a Golden Globe(n)

programme.title: Fido
programme.desc: This lively black comedy turns the zombie movie on its undead head. Billy Connolly is a howl as a zombie who's been domesticated to do work around a suburban couple's home, where he befriends their young son. All goes well until his electrified collar goes on the fritz and he reverts to his bloodthirsty, flesh-eating ways(n)

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: British ship captain and his crew battle a French vessel during the Napoleonic Wars. Eventually, the pursuit leads the two ships on an adrenaline-charged chase through the distant reaches of the sea(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The third entry in the popular pulp-adventure series finds Rick O'Connell and wife, Evelyn, in 1940s China with their now-adult son, Alex . Together they battle a centuries-old Chinese emperor and his undead army(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In this thrilling and inspirational sci-fi drama, a lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Stir of Echoes: The Homecoming
programme.desc: This direct-to-DVD sequel features Rob Lowe as an Iraq War veteran whose past comes back to haunt him in Stir of Echoes: The Homecoming. Upon returning home from the line of duty, National Guard Captain Ted Cogan thought his life would go back to normal, until he started seeing visions of a group of innocent bystanders he inadvertently killed in Iraq. With his family on the brink of destruction, Ted turns to a psychic that aids him in understanding what needs to be done to put these restless souls at peace - even if it means giving up his own life(n)

programme.title: Wanted

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Though ostensibly a family-oriented outing, Ivan Reitman's Kindergarten Cop ensures that fans of star Arnold Schwarzenegger's action films won't be disappointed by pumping up the Cop half of the equation to a surprisingly high degree. Schwarzenegger stars as John Kimble, an L.A. cop who learns that the ex-wife and son of his drug-dealer quarry Crisp (Richard Tyson) are living in secrecy in small-town Oregon. Kimble is partnered with Phoebe (Pamela Reed), a former teacher, who is slated to begin undercover work at the school where Crisp's ex is suspected of working under an assumed identity. However, Phoebe becomes ill, forcing rough, gruff Kimble to take over the kindergarten class instead(n)
